title: 42: Ice Cream Parlors in Charleston, WV
description:
Adjust your husky pants and let us show you the world, shining glimmering... something. We're back and we're hungry for what West Virginia has to offer, hairy underbelly and all. So turn your ;( upside down and let these regular bloody stupid johnsons take you on another exploration of awful reviews and the people who write them.

Support us on Patreon at patreon.com/beachtoosandy to join our patron only Q&A! 

Buy our merch! https://store.dftba.com/collections/beach-too-sandy-water-too-wet

Logo by Courtney DeKorte. Theme by Mavus White.
Music by PSOVOD and tyops.
